DOC.brief_title: Studies Neuroendocrine Energy Metabolism Patients With Eating Disorders
DOC.detailed_description: The study subject include female patient DSM-IV diagnosis AN ( n = 30 ) , BN ( n = 60 ) age-controled normal subject ( n = 30 ) . They receive clinical interview ask complete several self-administered questionnaire include eating-related questionnaire , general psychological functioning scale personality scale . After overnight fast , subject undergoes blood sample collection neuroendocrine examination , body composition examination use BIA method , basal metabolic rate measurement indirect calorimetry , ECG morning 0800 0900 . Clinical patient would ask repeat fill self-rating scale , weight body fat measurement , well blood draw 2 month treatment .
DOC.criteria: Subjects fulfil DSMIV diagnosis anorexia nervosa bulimia nervosa Normal control Any major psychiatric disorder Use psychoactive medication Drug alcohol abuse Medical problem ( cardiovascular condition endocrine disorder )
